0.0.1.name: wordpress/wp-wurfl
0.0.1.description:
WML and XHTML-MP extension for Wordpress, allowing mobile devices to access your blog.
Device is recognised by WURFL and based on the capability, proper theme is choosed. Themes are based on original Wordpress PDA & iPhone plugin, by Imthiaz Rafiq (http://imthi.com/)
